评论概述: Great, but not for eye coverage
评论详情: I'm not doing a bad rating bc the glasses aren't designed for it in the first place, but want to say that you can't really push them up to fully cover your eyes bc the nosepads are too wide apart because they're designed to be worn lower on your face. I have sensory issues with lighting and need red lenses sometimes, and I took my chances on these to see if I could make them work, but they didn't. The glasses are really great quality, but if you're like me and want to have your vision covered, you'll need a different pair than these!
